data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
Audio recording of Earnings Conference Call of Sutlej Textiles and Industries Limited (the Company)

This is with reference to our letter dated 04th February 2025 wherein we had informed you that Earnings Conference Call with investors of the Company will be held on 10th February 2025 to discuss Q3 & 9M FY25 Results. Please note that the said conference call as scheduled was held today at 04.00 p.m. (IST).

In compliance with regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations 2015 read with Schedule III given below is the link to access the audio recording of the Earnings Conference Call:  

https://www.sutlejtextiles.com/pdf/Earning%20Call/Audio_Link_Q3FY25.mp3

You are requested to take a note of the same.
